title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10ยง 10.10 - Water supply
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10ยง 10.10 - Water supply

State Regulations

An adequate supply of hot and cold water from a municipal or satisfactory private source shall be provided for service for customers, cleanliness of employees, and for washing floors, walls, ceiling and equipment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10ยง
10.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
